posts.post_content: This is exactly the kind of card that [Undead Alchemist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Undead Alchemist) needed. All it takes with Undead Alchemist is connecting once and then it can get way out of control. With Undead Alchemist and this card on the field you are going to mill your opponent one way or another. The only way around this card is to exile it or use removal on [Undead Alchemist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Undead Alchemist).
posts.html:

posts.post_content: NoobOfLore is right in that Geralf's Mindcrusher is better, but is much harder to come across in a pack. If anything, It serves to augment the Mindcrusher: it comes out a turn faster, but doesn't cause a mill effect until it dies. At common, this more than balances the card against the rare Mindcrusher. Each has their uses.
